descriptionHtml:
Adds the Umbra Sword to the land of Skyrim, as for some reason the Umbra Sword is only hinted about in skyrim, but is not in the game! So as my first Skyrim mod i have added the most well known Sword in the Elder Scrolls Series! UMBRA! The Sword can be found outside of Silverdrift lair, In the ruin of Al'Strand, a mighty Orc has the Sword you must defeat him, although he is a very high level, so be atleast level 25-30 before trying this! The Umbra does 40+ Damage and has Level 5 Soul Trap!!!

Umbra Mod Video: http://youtu.be/sguZcxbqX_E

Subscribe: www.youtube.com/k1ngcraft
author: K1ngSarOs
